Description of incident: "What Happened? On March 14, 2017, a data security incident occurred which may have affected your personal information. When we discovered the incident on the same day, we immediately launched an investigation, and reported it to the FBI, the SEC and the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority (FINRA). Our information technology personnel also took measures to secure all client information. What Information Was Involved? The incident may have involved names, dates of birth, and Social Security numbers."
